definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
sweet and sour pork/also written 咕嚕肉|咕噜肉[gu1 lu1 rou4]

sentences.english: It is one of the famous paintings in the ancient Eygptian history.
sentences.chinese: 這是古老的埃及史上最著名的油畫之一。

sentences.english: It turns out Jialing is one of the oldest and largest motorcycle manufacturers in its home country.
sentences.chinese: 嘉陵是中國最古老也是最大的摩托車生產商之一。

sentences.english: What were the subtexts of this venerable tale?
sentences.chinese: 這部古老的童話所暗含的意義是什麼呢？

sentences.english: Beauty fit to ornament those ancient manors.
sentences.chinese: 適於裝飾那些古老的莊園的美人。

sentences.english: Chang'e 1 Lunar orbiter will achieve the ancient dream of the Chinese.
sentences.chinese: “嫦娥1號”將完成的，是中國人的一個古老的夢想。

sentences.english: Heroic soul grows out of fashion like an old song.
sentences.chinese: 渴望絢爛的靈魂早已老去，逝成一首古老的歌曲。

sentences.english: Intriguingly, this could mean the device is even older than thought.
sentences.chinese: 有趣的是，這意味着這個裝置可能比想象的還要古老。

sentences.english: Taizhou is a both old and new city.
sentences.chinese: 台州是一座古老而又年輕的城市。

sentences.english: How did this ancient Chinese tradition make its way across the seas?
sentences.chinese: 這個中國古老的傳統是如何遠渡重洋的呢？

sentences.english: Tore his old wings off with a sigh.
sentences.chinese: 嘆息着他撕下自己古老的鮮血淋淋的翅膀。

sentences.english: From ancient times, there has been only one path going toward the temple which is named "Xiangyun road."
sentences.chinese: 上慧濟寺必須從一條古老的香雲路登山。

sentences.english: An ancient city of northern Egypt east of Alexandria. It was the site of a great temple honoring Serapis.
sentences.chinese: 坎努帕斯埃及北部一座古老城市，位於亞歷山大東部。

sentences.english: Ancient words will guide us Home.
Judges 5 is also another ancient song fragment in verses four to five.
sentences.chinese: 士師記》5中也有古老歌謠的片段，詩4和。

sentences.english: I think a lot of great stores and the stores down there are very like small and vintage.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得那裏的很多既小又古老的商店很不錯。

sentences.english: I know radio began by restoring the ancient art of storyteller .
sentences.chinese: 我知道，廣播的開始是藉助於說書人這種古老藝術。

definition: simple and unadorned (of art, architecture etc)
passed on from generation to generation (idiom); to hand down
